      Adds the passed instance of Appointment to the ObservableList allAppointments
      static boolean addAppointmentToDatabase​(Appointment givenAppointment)
      Constructs and executes a prepared Insert sql query as a middle-man translator between instances of the Appointment data structure and the SQL database being added to
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentPopulation()
      Populates the allAppointments ObservableList from the SQL database's stored entries
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> ContactAppointmentPopulation​(int ContactID)
      Populates the allAppointments ObservableList from the SQL database's stored entries where the ContactID matches the one provided.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> CustomerAppointmentPopulation​(int CustomerID)
      Populates the allAppointments ObservableList from the SQL database's stored entries where the CustomerID matches the one provided.
      static boolean deleteAppointment​(Appointment selectedAppointment)
      Removes the selectedAppointment value from the ObservableList of existing values and removes its AppointmentID integer value from the pool of AppointmentID values in-use so that it may be freely reassigned if need be, maintaining parity with the SQL database's Primary Key column.
      static boolean deleteAppointmentFromDatabase​(Appointment givenAppointment)
      Deletes the row entry in the SQL database appointments table that matches the passed Appointment

    • Constructor Detail

      • Appointment

        public Appointment​(int AppointmentID,
                   java.lang.String AppointmentTitle,
                   java.lang.String AppointmentDesc,
                   java.lang.String AppointmentLocation,
                   java.lang.String AppointmentContact,
                   java.lang.String AppointmentType,
                   java.lang.String AppointmentStartDateTime,
                   java.lang.String AppointmentEndDateTime,
                   int AppointmentCustomerID,
                   int AppointmentUserID)
        Appointment data structure
        Parameters:
        AppointmentID - The Appointment's ID, unique as used to reference to specific instances of Appointment
        AppointmentTitle - The Appointment's title string
        AppointmentDesc - The Appointment's description string
        AppointmentLocation - The Appointment's location string
        AppointmentContact - The Appointment's designated Contact that exists within the database
        AppointmentType - The Appointment's type description string
        AppointmentStartDateTime - The Appointment's Start Date and Time, stored as a String but treated as a DateTime in most instances and converted as needed whenever accessing or assigning value
        AppointmentEndDateTime - The Appointment's End Date and Time, stored as a String but treated as a DateTime in most instances and converted as needed whenever accessing or assigning value
        AppointmentCustomerID - The Appointment's designated Customer that exists within the database
        AppointmentUserID - The Appointment's designated User that exists within the database

      • addAppointmentToDatabase

        public static boolean addAppointmentToDatabase​(Appointment givenAppointment)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructs and executes a prepared Insert sql query as a middle-man translator between instances of the Appointment data structure and the SQL database being added to
        Parameters:
        givenAppointment - the provided instance of Appointment whose values are to be entered into the SQL database
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating a successful sql insertion
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database interaction issues

      • ContactAppointmentPopulation

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> ContactAppointmentPopulation​(int ContactID)
                                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Populates the allAppointments ObservableList from the SQL database's stored entries where the ContactID matches the one provided.
        Parameters:
        ContactID - the provided Contact ID integer to search for within the SQL database
        Returns:
        ObservableList with only entries matching the provided ContactID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database issues

      • modifyAppointmentInDatabase

        public static boolean modifyAppointmentInDatabase​(Appointment givenAppointment)
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Makes changes to the SQL database entry that matches the passed Appointment
        Parameters:
        givenAppointment - The changed Appointment to overwrite the existing entry within the SQL database
        Returns:
        a boolean indication if the SQL database entry was successfully updated
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database issues

      • updateAppointment

        public static void updateAppointment​(int index,
                                     Appointment selectedAppointment)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Makes changes to the ObservableList entry that matches the passed Appointment's index location
        Parameters:
        index - the location within the ObservableList that is to have its value overwritten
        selectedAppointment - the new Appointment value that will overwrite the existing ObservableList value
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database issues

      • deleteAppointmentFromDatabase

        public static boolean deleteAppointmentFromDatabase​(Appointment givenAppointment)
        Deletes the row entry in the SQL database appointments table that matches the passed Appointment
        Parameters:
        givenAppointment - The selected Appointment to have its existing entry within the SQL database be deleted
        Returns:
        a boolean indication if the SQL database entry was successfully deleted

      • deleteAppointment

        public static boolean deleteAppointment​(Appointment selectedAppointment)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Removes the selectedAppointment value from the ObservableList of existing values and removes its AppointmentID integer value from the pool of AppointmentID values in-use so that it may be freely reassigned if need be, maintaining parity with the SQL database's Primary Key column.
        Parameters:
        selectedAppointment - the Appointment value that will be removed from the ObservableList
        Returns:
        a boolean indication if the Appointment was successfully removed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database issues
